definition: Marseille, city in south France/Basay, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
Basay, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan/Maasai people of Kenya

sentences.english: Marseille offered him a deal, but it was worth around €7 million over three seasons.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽給他提供的合同三年才7百萬歐。

sentences.english: He once again nosed ahead of me on the horse race last week.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期的馬賽上，他又一次以微弱優勢勝過了我。

sentences.english: Over $10 million were bet on the Hong Kong Derby last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年香港馬賽上的賭金總數達一千多萬美元。

sentences.english: Teissier says Marseille has all it takes to be a leader in the Mediterranean region.
sentences.chinese: 泰西耶說，馬賽具備成爲地中海地區領袖的一切條件。

sentences.english: Marseille's bid to host the new Mediterranean pact headquarters faces competition.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽爭取成爲新地中海合作協議總部的努力遇到挑戰。

sentences.english: Marseilles is a chief port and Lyon is an industrial center famous for its textiles.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽是最大的港口，而里昂則以紡織工業著稱於世。

sentences.english: Considering himself exploited, however, he left Saint-Etienne for Olympique de Marseille.
sentences.chinese: 考慮自己開發，但是，他離開聖艾蒂安的馬賽。

sentences.english: Lyon slipped to third place, three points behind PSG.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽滑落至積分榜中游，7分落後第三名里爾。

sentences.english: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is the year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說歐洲冠軍盃今年的得主是奧林匹克馬賽隊。

sentences.english: Mastic is the recommended adhesive for gluing indoor mosaic tiles.
sentences.chinese: 乳香是室內馬賽克瓷磚粘合膠建議。

sentences.english: M. Villefort is no longer at Marseilles; he is now at Toulouse.
sentences.chinese: 維爾福先生已不在馬賽了，他現在在圖盧茲。

sentences.english: Come, Fernand, won't you return to Marseilles with us?
sentences.chinese: 走，弗爾南多，你不和我們一塊兒回馬賽嗎？

sentences.english: Marseille by boat from Hong Kong on 20 minutes executives to the island.
sentences.chinese: 從馬賽港坐船20分鐘就到了伊福島。

sentences.english: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is this year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.chinese: 但我聽說歐洲冠軍盃今年的得主是奧林匹克馬賽隊。

sentences.english: Auf wiedersehen Lost his place to Tim Howard and took his gloves to Marseille.
sentences.chinese: 被霍華德搶走位置之後就去了馬賽。

sentences.english: In the middle of the centerpiece mosaic hangs a chandelier encased in a blue glass cube.
sentences.chinese: 頂面馬賽克圖騰的中心掛着罩着藍色玻璃的枝形吊燈。

definition: Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
